content:
Infura doesn‚Äôt peer directly with anyone today as far as I‚Äôm aware and doing so would increase their chances of being eclipsed because they‚Äôd be trusting those connections. 
The way to avoid eclipse attacks is to ensure you have a broad variety of peers. Basically eclipse attacks are a form of censorship and the answer is decentralisation.
